description:
The pipeline

MpGAP, is a very customisable (easy to use) pipeline that uses state-of-the-art software for the de novo assembly of sequencing reads. It is capable of performing short reads only, long reads only and hybrid assemblies using data from Illumina, Pacbio and Oxford Nanopore Technologies sequencing platforms. As a plus, it has only Docker/Singularity and Nextflow as dependencies.
title: fmalmeida/MpGAP: A generic multi-platform genome assembly pipeline
